## Description of the Requested Feature
[Talk about something you'd like to see in the server! We're open to any and all ideas, so if you think fireballs would be cool to sling at bosses, let us know!  have an idea for a skill tree with pinpoint details on how the level progression would work?  Cool, let us know!  We want to get as many people's ideas involved as possible.  The most popular ideas will be looked at for regular update releases.]
